document_data.name: ''Lightning's Lure Liqueur''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite adventurers league/Last Orders at the Yawning Portal|63}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lightning's Lure Liqueur''''' was a variety of magical spirits named after the ''[[lightning lure]]'' [[spell]], available in the city of [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The [[enchanted]] beverage was on [[Yawning Portal]] tavern's menu in Waterdeep with its bottle stashed away in [[Durnan]]'s cabinet. One serving of ''Lightning's Lure Liqueur'' was priced at ten [[gold]] [[coin]]s.
